name: sierra-library-website
description: The smallest and lightest scss library

scripts.build: npm run build:prod && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:dev: node-sass --include-path node_modules src/index.scss css/styles.css && postcss --use autoprefixer css/styles.css -d css/
scripts.build:prod: node-sass --include-path node_modules src/index.scss css/styles.min.css --output-style compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer css/styles.min.css -d css/
